name: IndianTraditions
0:
”Alexa, Open Indian Traditions”
”Alexa, Open Indian Traditions and tell me about Namaste”
”Alexa, Begin Indian Traditions”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: indian traditions
des:
Indian Culture and traditions are something which has now become renowned all across the world. We all refer to India and its culture as something very diverse and unique. But seldom do we give a thought to why things are done in certain specific ways. This skill will provide details of top followed traditions in detailed view.
We presently added some options for tradition info as: Namaste, Curd and Sugar, Holy Cow, Indian temples, Chandan and Haldi, Touching Feets, Festive India, Joint Families, Fasting (upvas or vrat), Arranged Marriages, Ethnic Wears or Dance Forms.
The skill adds the basic functions like help, stop or cancel. You can also ask for repeat and help anytime if problem arises.

Note: We will be adding more traditions in future updates. Please share you valuable comments & reviews.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
